name: The Adventures of Jason and the Argonauts
description: This exciting Match 3 adventure game takes you on a journey beyond the edge of the world. Join ancient Greek heroes in search of the Golden Fleece.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/ME/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 1.0GHz CPU Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: 128MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/ME/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 1.2GHz CPU Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 256MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
